EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.10-27-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IT Halloween Costume and How to Train Your Microservice Like Dreamworks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
October 27, 2016 <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/what-should-your-it-team-be-for-halloween]]> What Should Your IT Team Be For Halloween? We know your IT folks may be a tad too busy to think up an appropriate costume. So we made this fun quiz to help pick out just the right one! Take The Quiz <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/what-should-your-it-team-be-for-halloween]]> <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/what-happens-when-no-one-and-everyone-owns-a-product-4f76ebb85455#.if1fcgkrf]]> What Happens When No One and Everyone Owns a Product? Cornelia Davis explains how DevOps can help your team own and build products. Read More <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/what-happens-when-no-one-and-everyone-owns-a-product-4f76ebb85455#.if1fcgkrf]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cSnfFqDW4jQ]]> How to Train Your Microservice Find out how Dreamworks Animation is changing its movie-making culture by embracing a microservice platform. Watch Now <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cSnfFqDW4jQ]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/case-studies/how-automakers-and-the-internet-of-things-are-colliding-to-save-lives]]> How Automakers and the IoT Are Colliding to Save Lives Here's how Pivotal is helping the largest German manufacturer alert drivers of dangerous weather conditions. Read More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal/case-studies/how-automakers-and-the-internet-of-things-are-colliding-to-save-lives]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xVQtEh77nA0]]> My Gender is Emoji Pizza Unicorn: Shipping Expanded Gender Options at Pinterest Learn how Tilde Ann Thurium convinced the folks at Pinterest to build and ship expanded gender options. Watch the Talk <[[https://youtu.be/xVQtEh77nA0?list=PLAdzTan_eSPTdjdjxeL9pGmnKgN1UVF7B]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/does-data-need-its-own-devops-moment]]> Does Data Need its Own DevOps Moment? In this episode of Pivotal Insights, host Jeff Kelly speaks with Elisabeth Hendrickson, head of R&D for Pivotal's data portfolio, about how agile and DevOps might be applied to data analytics, what it would mean from a people and process perspective, and how data analytics technologies would need to evolve to support it. Listen to the Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/does-data-need-its-own-devops-moment]]> <[[https://youtu.be/PkMekwSxano]]> Why Should You Continuously Deliver? Tushar Dadani shares some lessons he learned in his pursuit of a continuously delivered platform.
